Package com.im.njams.sdk.settings.provider

Class FileSettingsProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.im.njams.sdk.settings.provider.FileSettingsProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SettingsProvider
    public class FileSettingsProvider
extends Object
implements SettingsProvider
    Implements a simple FileSettingsProvider. It loads and saves a Settings to a specified file.
    Author:
    pnientiedt

      File getFile()
      Get the File where Settings is stored.
      String getName()
      Returns the value "file" as name for this SettingsProvider.
      Settings loadSettings()
      Loads the Settings from the configured file, or returns a new empty Settings if the file does not exist.
      void setFile​(File file)
      Set the File from where Settings should be loaded.
